titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for suspending the execution of a commission of reprizal granted unto Sir Edmond Turner and George Carew, on behalf of themselves and others
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the tenth day of August, 1666. in the eighteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
